title: Were Requests To Deploy National Guard Initially Denied During Capitol Riots?
subtitle: Law enforcement was criticized for its slow response as chaos unfolded at the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The Department of Defense initially denied a request by D.C. officials to deploy the National Guard at the U.S. Capitol as it was breached by a pro-Trump mob seeking to  prevent the certification of the 2020 presidential election.
